sense.gloss: to find fault with, to question
to blame, to reproach, to censure, to rebuke, to reprove, to find fault, to take to task, to criticize, to criticise
to aggravate (an injury), to be aggravated, to get inflamed

r_ele.r: りょうしんがとがめる

sense.gloss: to have a guilty conscience, to have (something) lie heavy on one's conscience
to feel guilty, to suffer from a guilty conscience, to feel uneasy, to have qualms about, to have scruples about, to feel regret

sdata.j: もしあなたが↑試験↑↓しけん↓でカンニングをやってもそれで↑何↑↓なん↓の↑咎↑↓とが↓めも↑受↑↓う↓けずに↑済↑↓す↓むと↑思↑↓おも↓っているなら、とんでもない↑話↑↓はなし↓だ。
sdata.e: If you think you can get away with cheating on the exam, you've got another thing coming.

sdata.j: そのガイドを↑咎↑↓とが↓めるな。
↑警官↑↓けいかん↓は↑時速↑↓じそく↓８０キロで↑運転↑↓うんてん↓したと↑私↑↓わたし↓を↑咎↑↓とが↓めた。
sdata.e: The officer charged me with driving 80 kilometers an hour.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓はそんな↑事↑↓こと↓をするのはいささか↑気↑↓き↓が↑咎↑↓とが↓めた。
sdata.e: I had a slight scruple about doing that kind of thing.

sdata.j: ↑先生↑↓せんせい↓は↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓が↑間違↑↓まちが↓ったことを↑咎↑↓とが↓めた。
sdata.e: The teacher blamed her for the mistake.

words.gloss: to find fault with, to question
